title: Requires that any newly enacted or adopted building code in N.Y. city shall contain notice provisions similar to those required for buildings with truss type construction
summary: Requires that any newly enacted or adopted building code in NYC shall contain notice provisions similar to those required for buildings with truss type construction; additionally, such new building code shall contain identical notice provisions, as set forth for residential structures.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3148

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CALHOUN -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Governmental Operations

       AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the identification  of
         structures with truss type construction in the city of New York

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 5 of section 382-a of  the  executive  law,  as
    2  added by chapter 119 of the laws of 2001, is amended to read as follows:
    3    5.  The  provisions of this section shall not apply to any city with a
    4  population of one million or more persons PROVIDED, HOWEVER, IF  SUCH  A
    5  CITY  ENACTS  OR  ADOPTS  A NEW BUILDING CODE SUBSEQUENT TO THE FIRST OF
    6  JANUARY, TWO THOUSAND ELEVEN, THEN SUCH NEWLY ENACTED OR ADOPTED  BUILD-
    7  ING  CODE  SHALL  CONTAIN  NOTICE  PROVISIONS  WHICH  ARE THE SAME AS OR
    8  SUBSTANTIALLY SIMILAR TO THE NOTICE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION. IN ADDI-
    9  TION, SUCH NEW BUILDING CODE SHALL CONTAIN IDENTICAL NOTICE  PROVISIONS,
   10  AS SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, FOR RESIDENTIAL STRUCTURES.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02750-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the identification of structures with truss type construction in the city of New York
